Room.Name: Secret Compartment Under the Fountain
Room.ShortDescription: This is Caledon's secret cave under the Oceancrest Memorial Fountain.
Room.LongDescription: This is a nice, quiet area where Caledon comes to work on Oceancrest and other areas of Mordor. On the walls are very detailed drawings of the vast city of Oceancrest. The only exit out of here is a small ladder leading back up into the Fountain.
